tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Honduras, 'murder capital of the world'
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The Honduran city of San Pedro Sula holds the grim record of having the highest per-capita homicide rate in the world. As city authorities battle against corruption, crime and drug-related violence, residents live in fear and distrust.Duration: 02:51

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: acutely I have a very good working knowledge of drugs, and can say that marijuana , it far safer and has much less effect on social dysfunction , than drinking boooz , infarct it incorrect the smoker to think more about social problems , boooz dose not , harder drugs like cocain and opium are mind and sole destroying like boooz , booz﻿ produces stuiped children ,and causes more problem than the tax can pay for that's sweeped under the rug by the booz producing corporations
wth is﻿ up with the extreme closeups? 1:27 there's no need for me to see the individual hair follicles on his brow.

good report but i must say that la ceiba (another honduran city) has a higher official murder rate than sps. juarez probably still has a higher murder rate than sps in 2011, despite a significant drop
the report that originally came out with these numbers is flawed, though funnily enough normally is﻿ biased towards putting as many mexican cities in the list and as high as possible. i think theyve actually screwed up putting juarez behind sps for a couple of reasons which i wont go into

im Honduran and I live in Tegucigalpa...the real problem is corruption, the police is the main body of drug and weapon trafficking. first in murder? I dont believe so, even though I must admit the insecurity level is high. Ive never been assaulted or any of the kind, but I fear going out late at night or leaving my house alone...I love my country and Im studying civil ingeneering to﻿ help my people, because we cant keep on living this way
This is not good. I used to﻿ live there and
I'm from there but i was born in the USA but my family of there﻿ if filthy rich so yeah

CAPITALISM creates DRUG LORDS. LAWYERS. BANKERS. ELITE CRIMINALS. INEQUALITY. INSECURITY. GREED. RUTHLESS COMMUNISM. NWO. NAZI. TERRORISM. LAZY PEOPLE. REBEL POLITICIAN. ANARCHY. worst is WAR etc.. ☠ ☢ ☠ ☢ ☠ ☢ ☠
CAPITALISM was designed only for CORRUPT OPPORTUNISTIC MANIPULATIVE LAZY POLITICIAN. BANKERS. NARCOPOLITICIAN. JUDGES. CRIMINALS.﻿ DICTATORS. RULERS. KING. SULTANATE. EMPEROR etc..
HARD WORKING PEACE LOVING HAPPY HONEST SOCIETY were always the slave victim and poorly starve to death. :(
este ano 2012 esta ciuda de honduras quedo como la mas peligrosa﻿ del mundo lastima triste realida

My country was not like this before...you could sleep with your door open and had no worries of intruders or﻿ robbery...that's when the military controlled the country. I'm talking about being able to stay up until 12 playing with your friends or just hanging out!!..we where poor but lived in relative peace with some stability. Now we have some progress and can't stick our motherfucking nose outside our doors...How I miss the days when the men in green roamed the streets with a watchful eye.

To put this in perspective I worked the numbers. I live in a city in Georgia that has a population of about 185 thousand and there are about 30 murders a year. We think this is way too high. At the same﻿ murder rate as Honduras we would have about 180 murders a year. I'm going there in two weeks for a church mission trip and a week of sightseeing. My main plan is to get back to my hotel room by 9 pm and read a book. Other than that I plan to see the sights and enjoy the people and the local food.
Legalizing drugs would make crime﻿ organizations and drug dealers very unhappy.
I was there 1975 , when i was a﻿ boy. I remember the Soldiers patroling the streets.
you wont regret it...we are really thankfull with any﻿ foreigner that comes to our country to help...youll surely feel the welcoming of our most humble people

what legalize drugs you fucking brainless teenager?? do you know what drugs are?? Do you have any idea how they fuck up your brain, your thinking, your functioning? Do you have any idea how they affect the whole population? I didn't think so﻿ either. stupid kid
